bug.author: ankitaggarwal011
bug.description: In the last section "Links" available on <denchmark-link:http://opencv.org/platforms/opencl.html>http://opencv.org/platforms/opencl.html</denchmark-link> documentation, the first link pointing to <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1qoa29N_B-s297-fp0-b3rBirvpzJQp8dCtllLQ4DVCY/present>https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1qoa29N_B-s297-fp0-b3rBirvpzJQp8dCtllLQ4DVCY/present</denchmark-link> is non-operational. The same link is also used on the same page in the text "More details on the T-API can be found in the following slides." with "slides" pointing to the discussed non-operational link.

comments.comment: This presentation seem to be unavailable, broken link has been removed.
